review: Super for casting the Chrome browser contents to the TV. Like I said in another review of the Fire TV Stick,  I have the Fire TV Stick, Roku 3, Chromecast and smart TVs. Each works well for what they are designed. Just wish it was a universal device for any app or stream and that I could cast anything from my computers to the TV.
author: MCOHRS "MCOHRS"

review: My chromecast is showing "reconnect me: ChromecastXXXX connected to, but can't access the internet". After resetting the chromecast and my router multiple times I finally called Google for help. They said nothing I had not already tried and eventually just hung up on me. Since they had emailed me something before that I wrote the person back to say to call me on my phone but got no response.  I have another chromecast that has worked with out any issues, but clearly Google cannot solve problems with hardware when something goes wrong.
author: Brian

review: We cut the cord with Directv and use this little gadget like crazy.  I recommend the Chromecast to people all the time now.  I even stood in Wal-Mart and convinced a lady to buy one!  Since CBS shows aren't available on Hulu, I use the Chromecast to cast my CBS shows from my desktop computer to the TV.  It work wonderfully!
